statements: SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand_trends;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM seasonal_demand_trends WHERE demand_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand_trends ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM seasonal_demand_trends WHERE demand_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-02-28';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM seasonal_demand_trends;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand_trends WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM seasonal_demand_trends WHERE demand_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY demand_quantity ASC, demand_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand_trends WHERE product_name LIKE '%shoes%' OR product_name LIKE '%boots%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, demand_date FROM seasonal_demand_trends WHERE demand_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY demand_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(demand_quantity) AS avg_demand, YEAR(demand_date) AS year FROM seasonal_demand_trends GROUP BY YEAR(demand_date) ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM SeasonalDemandTrends;
SELECT product_id, season, demand_quantity FROM SeasonalDemandTrends WHERE season='Winter';
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM SeasonalDemandTrends WHERE forecasted_demand > 1000;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecasting WHERE forecast_accuracy='High';
SELECT forecasting_id, predicted_demand FROM DemandForecasting ORDER BY predicted_demand DESC;
SELECT product_id, season, demand_quantity, forecasted_demand FROM SeasonalDemandTrends WHERE season='Winter' ORDER BY demand_quantity ASC;
SELECT product_id, season, demand_quantity, forecasted_demand FROM SeasonalDemandTrends WHERE season='Summer' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, season, demand_quantity, forecasted_demand FROM SeasonalDemandTrends WHERE demand_quantity > 100 AND season='Spring';
SELECT product_id, season, demand_quantity, forecasted_demand FROM SeasonalDemandTrends WHERE demand_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id, season DESC;

SELECT product_id, season, demand_quantity, forecasted_demand FROM SeasonalDemandTrends JOIN DemandForecasting ON SeasonalDemandTrends.product_id = DemandForecasting.product_id WHERE DemandForecasting.forecast_accuracy='High' AND SeasonalDemandTrends.demand_quantity > DemandForecasting.predicted_demand ORDER BY SeasonalDemandTrends.product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY demand DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000 AND category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_demand DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM products JOIN sales_data ON products.product_id = sales_data.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT month, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM sales_data JOIN seasonal_demands ON sales_data.demand = seasonal_demands.demand GROUP BY month ORDER BY total_demand DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_price > 200;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand_trends;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM seasonal_demand_trends ORDER BY demand_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM seasonal_demand_trends WHERE demand_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, demand_month FROM seasonal_demand_trends WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT sale_date, sale_quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM seasonal_demand_trends WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM seasonal_demand_trends WHERE demand_month = 'January' AND demand_quantity > 50
SELECT product_name, forecasted_quantity FROM seasonal_demand_trends JOIN demand_forecast ON seasonal_demand_trends.product_id = demand_forecast.product_id WHERE forecast_month = 'March'
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_calendar WHERE event_type = 'Conference' ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_quantity FROM seasonal_demand_trends JOIN sales_data ON seasonal_demand_trends.product_id = sales_data.product_id WHERE sale_date >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Seasons;
SELECT season_id, season_name FROM Seasons WHERE season_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sale_id, product_id, season_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, season_id, forecast_date, forecast_amount FROM Forecasts WHERE season_id = 2 ORDER BY forecast_date;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, sale_date FROM Products JOIN Sales ON Products.product_id = Sales.product_id WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT season_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM Seasons JOIN Sales ON Seasons.season_id = Sales.season_id GROUP BY season_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_amount FROM Forecasts WHERE forecast_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
